00020 static inline double dabs(double x)
00021 {
00022   return (x < 0 ? -x : x);
00023 }
00024 
00025 static inline double dsqr(double x)
00026 {
00027   return (x*x);
00028 }

00037 void FORTRAN(machep)(double* x)
00038 {
00039   *x = DBL_EPSILON;

00045 void GaussLegendrePoints(int n, double a, double b, 
00046                          double x[], double w[])
00047 {
00048   int KIND=1;
00049   double T[n];
00050   double WTS[n];
00051   int LO=0;
00052   int NWF=2*n;
00053   double WF[NWF];
00054   int NIWF=2*n;
00055   int IWF[NIWF];
00056   int IER;
00057 
00058   FORTRAN(cgqf)(&n, T, WTS, &KIND, NULL, NULL, &a, &b, &LO,
00059                 &NWF, WF, &NIWF, IWF, &IER);
00060 
00061   int i;
00062   for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
00063     x[i] = T[i];
00064     w[i] = WTS[i];
00065   }
00066 
00067   if (IER) {
00068     fprintf(stderr, "CGQF error code: %d\n", IER);
00069   }
00070   
00071 }

00076 void GaussChebyshevPoints(int n, double a, double b, 
00077                           double x[], double w[])
00078 {
00079   int KIND=2;
00080   double T[n];
00081   double WTS[n];
00082   int LO=0;
00083   int NWF=2*n;
00084   double WF[NWF];
00085   int NIWF=2*n;
00086   int IWF[NIWF];
00087   int IER;
00088 
00089   FORTRAN(cgqf)(&n, T, WTS, &KIND, NULL, NULL, &a, &b, &LO,
00090                 &NWF, WF, &NIWF, IWF, &IER);
00091 
00092   int i;
00093   for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
00094     x[i] = T[i];
00095     w[i] = WTS[i]/(pow((b-x[i])*(x[i]-a), -0.5));
00096   }
00097 
00098   if (IER) {
00099     fprintf(stderr, "CGQF error code: %d\n", IER);
00100   }
00101   
00102 }

00107 void GaussJacobiPoints(int n, double a, double b, 
00108                              double alpha, double beta,
00109                              double x[], double w[])
00110 {
00111   int KIND=4;
00112   double T[n];
00113   double WTS[n];
00114   int LO=0;
00115   int NWF=2*n;
00116   double WF[NWF];
00117   int NIWF=2*n;
00118   int IWF[NIWF];
00119   int IER;
00120 
00121   FORTRAN(cgqf)(&n, T, WTS, &KIND, &alpha, &beta, &a, &b, &LO,
00122                 &NWF, WF, &NIWF, IWF, &IER);
00123 
00124   int i;
00125   for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
00126     x[i] = T[i];
00127     w[i] = WTS[i]/(pow(b-x[i], alpha)*pow(x[i]-a, beta));
00128   }
00129 
00130   if (IER) {
00131     fprintf(stderr, "CGQF error code: %d\n", IER);
00132   }
00133   
00134 }

00139 void GaussExponentialPoints(int n, double a, double b, 
00140                             double alpha,
00141                             double x[], double w[])
00142 {
00143   int KIND=7;
00144   double T[n];
00145   double WTS[n];
00146   int LO=0;
00147   int NWF=2*n;
00148   double WF[NWF];
00149   int NIWF=2*n;
00150   int IWF[NIWF];
00151   int IER;
00152 
00153   FORTRAN(cgqf)(&n, T, WTS, &KIND, &alpha, NULL, &a, &b, &LO,
00154                 &NWF, WF, &NIWF, IWF, &IER);
00155 
00156   int i;
00157   for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
00158     x[i] = T[i];
00159     // don't use inf for x = (a+b)/2
00160     w[i] = (dabs(x[i]-0.5*(a+b))<1e-9 ? 0.0 : WTS[i]/(pow(dabs(x[i]-0.5*(a+b)), alpha)));
00161   }
00162 
00163   if (IER) {
00164     fprintf(stderr, "CGQF error code: %d\n", IER);
00165   }
00166   
00167 }

00188 void GaussSqrHermitePoints(int n, double b, double x[], double w[])
00189 {
00190   int ir;
00191 
00192   if (n>GPOINTS) {
00193     fprintf(stderr, "GaussSqrHermitePoints not yet implemented for n>%d\n", GPOINTS);
00194     return;
00195   }
00196 
00197   for (ir=0; ir<n; ir++) {
00198     x[ir] = rroots[n-1][ir]/sqrt(b);
00199     w[ir] = dsqr(rroots[n-1][ir])/b* rweights[n-1][ir]/sqrt(b);
00200   }
00201 }

00206 
00207 void GaussGenHermitePoints(int n, double b, 
00208                            double x[], double w[])
00209 {
00210   int KIND=6;
00211   int N=2*n;
00212   double A=0.0;
00213   double ALPHA=2.0;
00214   double T[N];
00215   double WTS[N];
00216   int LO=0;
00217   int NWF=2*N;
00218   double WF[NWF];
00219   int NIWF=2*N;
00220   int IWF[NIWF];
00221   int IER;
00222 
00223   FORTRAN(cgqf)(&N, T, WTS, &KIND, &ALPHA, NULL, &A, &b, &LO,
00224                 &NWF, WF, &NIWF, IWF, &IER);
00225 
00226   int i;
00227   for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
00228     x[i] = T[n+i];
00229     w[i] = WTS[n+i]/(pow(x[i],ALPHA)*exp(-b*dsqr(x[i])));
00230   }
00231 
00232   if (IER) {
00233     fprintf(stderr, "CGQF error code: %d\n", IER);
00234   }
00235   
00236 }

00239 void ExtendedTrapezoidalPoints(int n, double a, double b,
00240                                double x[], double w[])
00241 {
00242   int i;
00243   double h=(b-a)/(n-1);
00244   
00245   x[0] = a; x[n-1] = b;
00246   w[0] = 0.5*h; w[n-1] = 0.5*h;
00247 
00248   for (i=1; i<n-1; i++) {
00249     x[i] = a+i*h;
00250     w[i] = h;
00251   }
00252 }
00253 
00254 
00255 void ShiftedPeriodicTrapezoidalPoints(int n, double a, double b, double shift,
00256                                       double x[], double w[])
00257 {
00258   int i;
00259   double h = (b-a)/n;
00260 
00261   for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
00262     x[i] = a+ (i+shift)*h;
00263     w[i] = h;
00264   }
00265 }
